Reference

All functions

compare_pathways()

Use SCPA to compare gene sets

compare_sce()

Use SCPA to compare pathways within a SingleCellExperiment object

compare_seurat()

Use SCPA to compare pathways within a Seurat object

format_pathways()

Format the output of msigdbr to use with SCPA

get_paths()

Convert gene sets to filtered pathway list

parallel_comparison()

Use SCPA to compare gene sets

pathway_matrices()

Create pathway matrices from gene sets

plot_heatmap()

Plot a heatmap of qvals from SCPA

plot_rank()

Plot the rank of specific pathways from SCPA output

random_cells()

Randomly sample cells (columns)

sce_extract()

Extract data from a SingleCellExperiment object

seurat_extract()

Extract Data From A Seurat Object

single_comparison()

Use SCPA to compare gene sets
